item.title: A Typology of Risks Affecting Enterprises
item.description: Complex enterprises suffer from a variety of risks. To build an appreciation of the scale and variety of enterprise risks, I built a typology using latest data mining and organizations methods used by our group at Purdue’s Innovation Science Laboratory. Have a look at the risk typology here. This resource is the bases for peer-review articles in development. Check back soon for updates on the articles.
